p: Hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine have demonstrated in vitro antiviral effectiveness against Herpes simplex virus type 1 [ 8], Zika [ 9, 10], HIV [ 11], MERS [ 12], SARS-CoV [ 12], HCoV-OC43 [ 13], Chikungunya [ 14], Hepatitis C [ 15], and several other viruses [ 11, 16]. For coronavirus, some studies suggested, at least in vitro, some efficacy of chloroquine on the SARS-CoV virus [ 12, 13] or MERS-CoV [ 17].
